title: Corner Cabinet (Encoignure)
description: Corner Cabinet (Encoignure); Attributed to Charles Cressent (French, 1685 - 1768, master 1719); Paris, France; about 1745; Oak veneered with tulipwood, kingwood, and amaranth; gilt-bronze mounts; 191.8 x 332.7 x 39.4 cm (75 1/2 x 131 x 15 1/2 in.); 79.DA.2.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
